actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill to repeal a provision of Federal tort claim law relating to the civil liability of Government contractors for certain injuries, losses of property, and deaths and for other purposes.

summary.text: Radiation Victims Fair Treatment Act - Repeals the provision in the Department of Defense Authorization Act, 1985 which: (1) substitutes the United States as defendant in all suits against private contractors for radiation injuries arising from atomic weapons testing programs; and (2) makes the Federal Tort Claims Act the sole remedy for those injuries. Details the applicability of statutes of limitations.

titles.title: A bill to repeal a provision of Federal tort claim law relating to the civil liability of Government contractors for certain injuries, losses of property, and deaths and for other purposes.
